name: Golem (itch) (John Paul Depew)
description:
Golem: a 2D side-scrolling platformer. This game centers on the ancient Jewish legends of Golems - human-like creatures made of stone and powered by fire. Explore and fight enemies as you seek to follow your master's orders.

Early Access Notes

This is a beta release, so please notify me if there are any bugs or errors. Levels are complete, but there are a few small features and improvements that will be added soon.
